Data: Sammy to Warner, 2 runs on the legs, turned away to deep backward square
Sammy to Warner, 1 run full, driven out towards cover
Sammy to Bailey, 1 run length ball, Bailey goes back and turns it to leg
Sammy to Warner, no run full, on the stumps, squirted away square
Sammy to Warner, no run sticks in the pitch and Warner loops the checked drive short of mid-off
Sammy to Warner, no run fuller, chopped into the ground and through to the keeper
Narine to Bailey, no run outside off, turning in, played back down the wicket
Narine to Bailey, 1 run a tad short and Bailey pulls past square leg
Narine to Warner, no run beautiful line from Narine, luring Warner forward and beating his outside edge as he tries to drive through the off side
Narine to Warner, no run tossed up and left as it turns away
Narine to Warner, no run drags slightly short, cut hard but well fielded at point
Narine to Warner, 4 byes the doosra from Narine, cuts Warner in half as he opened his arms, the ball flying over the stumps and past Baugh
Sammy to Bailey, no run shortish, defended into the off side
Sammy to Bailey, no run full, straight, knocked down to mid-on
Sammy to Bailey, 2 runs strays on to the pads and clipped to deep backward square leg
Sammy to Bailey, 1 run outside off, keeps low and jabbed to short midwicket
Sammy to Warner, 2 runs back of a length, anlged across and Warner doesn't quite connect with an airy pull, the ball doing just enough to clear the man running back towards deep midwicket
Sammy to Warner, 1 run driven from outside off through cover
Narine to Warner, no run flighted, not quite so much turn, deflecting off Baugh's gloves after Warner left
Narine to Warner, no run on leg, played with the spin to point
Narine to Warner, 1 run flatter, turning across the left-hander, patted out towards the point boundary
Narine to Bailey, no run tossed up outside off and pushed to cover
Narine to Bailey, no run flatter and quicker, beating Bailey's pull stroke and hitting him on the pads, outside off
Narine to Bailey, no run flighted, Bailey comes forward and defends tentatively
Sammy to Warner, FOUR runs edged through the vacant slip region - Australia's first boundary in almost ten overs

Sammy to Warner, OUT this time the edge finds a man and Warner is gone! He leaned into a cover drive but the ball didn't quite reach him as quickly as he expected, Warner stretching and the ball flying off the toe to the safe hands of Pollard at point
Sammy to Hussey, no run pitched up, driven back to the bowler
Sammy to Hussey, 1 run length, dropped short to cover and Hussey has to dive to make his ground after calling for a quick single
Sammy to Bailey, no run outside off, pushed into the covers
Sammy to Bailey, no run tighter line and screwing away off bat and pad towards extra-cover - Bailey still seems unable to time his shots properly
Bravo to Hussey, no run length, pushed square on the off side
Bravo to Hussey, no run pitched up outside off, swinging away a little, Hussey declines a shot - perhaps could have been called a wide
Bravo to Hussey, no run length, on the stumps, defended coming forward
Bravo to Hussey, no run again offering Hussey width, angled across the left-hander, but left alone
Bravo to Hussey, no run good line and length, the batsman steps out and lets it go by
Bravo to Hussey, no run width and Hussey goes for it this time but his cut is athletically saved by Pollard at point
Sammy to Bailey, no run length, outside off, pushed to cover
Sammy to Bailey, 2 runs pitched up and driven through the gap
Sammy to Bailey, no run line and length outside off, nudged to cover-point
Sammy to Bailey, 1 run on the stumps, slightly shorter and pulled round the corner to long leg
Sammy to Hussey, 3 runs angled across from leg, pulled fiercely square by Hussey but rescued on the boundary by Russell
Sammy to Bailey, no run length ball outside off, drawing the batsman forward to play and miss
Bravo to Hussey, no run good length and straight, played towards point from the crease
Bravo to Hussey, no run fuller ball angling across the left-hander, driven towards point on the front foot
Bravo to Hussey, FOUR runs length ball outside off, Hussey has width and he cuts between backward point and short third man
Bravo to Hussey, no run he comes forward this time and drives to cover
Bravo to Hussey, no run short of a length around off stump, defended on the back foot
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run fuller length outside off, Hussey strides forward and drives to cover
Sammy to Hussey, FOUR runs too full and too straight, Hussey gets on to the front foot and turns the ball off his pads past short fine leg
Sammy to Hussey, no run a full toss, Hussey was forward too early and played it to mid-off, it was a slower full toss
Sammy to Hussey, no run good length and straight, Hussey defends on the off side and Sammy runs across to field
Sammy to Hussey, no run played from the crease to point
Sammy to Hussey, 1 run Hussey drops the ball with soft hands close on the off side and runs a quick single, Pollard rushes in from point and tries to kick the ball on to the stumps
Sammy to Bailey, 1 run played close on the off for another very quick single, Pollard is unable to prevent it and he kicks the air
Bravo to Bailey, no run good length on off stump, Bailey defends on the front foot
Bravo to Bailey, no run full ball angling into middle stump, flicked towards midwicket
Bravo to Bailey, no run good length around off stump, defended from the crease to the off side
Bravo to Bailey, 1 run a length ball outside off, quite driveable that was and Bailey freed his arms to hit through cover
Bravo to Hussey, no run good length on middle and off, defended from the crease behind point
Bravo to Hussey, no run Hussey chases a length ball as it angles across him and gets beaten on the cover drive
Russell to Bailey, no run good length and straight, Bailey stays in his crease and dabs towards point
Russell to Bailey, no run defended on the off side
Russell to Bailey, 1 run fuller length on a straighter line, turned off the pads behind square
Russell to Hussey, no run good length and straight at 145 kph, Hussey gets behind the line and blocks
Russell to Hussey, no run Hussey moves forward and pushes a good length ball towards long-off
Russell to Hussey, no run speaking of Samuels, he's in the way of a firmly-hit cover drive and does well to block it. Hussey came forward and hit the full ball hard towards cover

Bravo to Bailey, 1 run full and straight, Baily moves forward and drives firmly into the ground, Bravo sticks his left hand out and deflects the ball wide of mid-off, Bailey sees an opportunity and runs a sharp single
Bravo to Hussey, no run played back to the bowler from the crease
Bravo to Hussey, no run driven off the front foot towards the off side
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run Hussey has width again outside off and he cuts hard, this time there's a fielder at third man
Bravo to Bailey, no run short of a length outside off, hit hard off the back foot towards cover
Bravo to Bailey, 1 run full on middle and leg, clipped off the pads towards long-on
Russell to Bailey, no run length ball outside off, played from the crease towards point
Russell to Bailey, no run Bailey slogs across the line at a good length ball and gets beaten, that was close to off stump
Russell to Bailey, 1 run turned off the pads towards fine leg
Russell to Hussey, 1 run Hussey moves forward and plays the ball close on the off side
Russell to Bailey, 2 runs driven uppishly but past the diving fielder at cover. Bailey moved forward and drove that on the up, hitting through the line

Russell to Bailey, no run there's a direct hit at the bowler's end but the batsman is safe. Pollard hesitated for a long while before throwing and so Bailey's dive saved him. Hussey had pushed towards point and Bailey ran a long way down from the non-striker's end before turning back
Samuels to Hussey, 2 runs played off the back foot in front of point
Samuels to Hussey, no run defended on the front foot, that ball hit the pad so Samuels appealed but it had pitched outside leg, only just
Samuels to Hussey, no run Hussey tries to drive but is beaten outside off as the ball spins across him
Samuels to Hussey, no run defended on the off side
Samuels to Hussey, 1 run played on the off once again
Samuels to Bailey, 1 run shorter length and Bailey uses the spin into him to pull behind square
Russell to Bailey, 1 run Bailey moves across his crease and flicks towards deep square leg
Russell to Hussey, no run Hussey steps out of his crease and defends on the leg side
Russell to Hussey, 1 run a slow full toss, Hussey moves forward and drives to mid-off
Russell to Bailey, no run Bailey presses forward and defends one that angles into him towards cover
Russell to Bailey, 2 runs short of a length and straight, played off the back foot towards midwicket, the throw to the keeper is sloppy and there's an overthrow
Russell to Bailey, (no ball) 1 run a front-foot no-ball, which Bailey drives towards long-on, Hussey will have a free-hit to attack
Russell to Hussey, FOUR runs and he's put it to good use, Hussey clears his front foot, waits for the slower ball and pulls it past the fielder at midwicket and into the gap on the boundary
Samuels to Bailey, 1 run Bailey gets down on one knee and sweeps towards long leg
Samuels to Hussey, 1 run pitches outside leg and spins across the batsman, Hussey moves back and taps behind square
Samuels to Bailey, 1 run played off the back foot on the off side

Samuels to Hussey, no run edged off the back foot but the ball falls short of slip, Hussey went deep into his crease and was squared up by one that pitched outside leg and spun across him, he took his bottom hand off the bat and the ball fell short of Dwayne Bravo
Samuels to Hussey, 2 runs played off the pads behind square
Samuels to Hussey, no run defended on the front foot
Russell to Bailey, no run good length angling into the right hander, played towards midwicket
Russell to Bailey, no run Bailey stays in his crease and flicks towards midwicket again
Russell to Bailey, 1 run short of a length, Bailey glances off his hips through square
Russell to Hussey, no run a short ball, and Hussey lets it go over him
Russell to Hussey, 1 run played through midwicket for a single, the ball was full and slower than the previous one
Russell to Bailey, 1 run played through square leg
Narine to Bailey, no run defended from the crease on the leg side
Narine to Bailey, 1 run Bailey moves outside off, gets down on one knee, and sweeps to deep square leg
Narine to Hussey, no run Narine pitches on a good length, drawing Hussey forward, and then spins it past the outside edge of his forward defence
Narine to Hussey, no run this time Hussey goes right back to defend, and gets beaten outside off once again
Narine to Hussey, 1 run Hussey slog sweeps and places the ball wide of the fielder at short third man, towards deep backward square leg
Narine to Bailey, no run Bailey moves back in his crease and gets squared up while defending
Pollard to Hussey, no run good length and straight, defended back to the bowler
Pollard to Hussey, no run Hussey takes two steps out of his crease but has to defend in the end, the length wasn't there to hit
Pollard to Hussey, 1 run a slower and shorter ball, Hussey stays on the back foot and pulls
Pollard to Bailey, 1 run short of a length around off, Bailey pulls towards deep square leg

Pollard to Hussey, 1 run played close on the off side for a single, Bravo is quick to the ball from point but then takes a while to decide which end to throw at, he goes for the non-striker's and misses
Pollard to Bailey, 1 run pulled gently behind square for a single
Narine to Bailey, no run Bailey goes back to play on the leg side but gets hit high on the thigh
Narine to Bailey, no run Bailey pushes forward to defend but doesn't manage to very convincingly
Narine to Bailey, no run quicker and straighter, Bailey defends on the front foot
Narine to Bailey, 1 run a tough too short, allowing Bailey to wait on the back foot and pull to deep square leg
Narine to Hussey, SIX runs Hussey's destroyed Narine's economy of just over one per over here, he got down on one knee and swept powerfully over the deep midwicket boundary, very clean hit
Narine to Hussey, no run left alone outside off as the ball spins across him
Pollard to Bailey, 1 run played off the front foot towards long-on for a single
Pollard to Hussey, 1 run short of a length outside off, hit of the back foot towards cover
Pollard to Bailey, 1 run Bailey moves across his crease and turns the ball off his pads towards fine leg
Pollard to Hussey, no run good length around off, Hussey defends from his crease on the off side
Pollard to Hussey, no run defended on the front foot towards cover point
Pollard to Hussey, 1 run driven off the pads towards long-on for a single
Samuels to Hussey, no run Hussey goes back and tries to hit the short ball through cover as it spins across him, he finds the fielder
Samuels to Hussey, no run defended on the back foot on the off side
Samuels to Hussey, no run steered off the back foot to point
Samuels to Hussey, no run Hussey moves forward and blocks
Samuels to Hussey, 1 run driven on the front foot to long off
Samuels to Bailey, no run Bailey stays in his crease and defends on the leg side, Samuels ambles across to defend
Pollard to Hussey, 1 run Hussey pushes towards mid-on and runs
Pollard to Bailey, no run Bailey moves back and defends a good length ball towards the bowler
Pollard to Bailey, 1 run Bailey muscles a pull in front of the fielder at midwicket, he jumped out of his crease and then had to wait for the ball
Pollard to Hussey, no run Hussey tries to hit the ball a bit too hard but mis-times the shot

Pollard to Hussey, 1 run a full slow ball, Hussey steps out and taps to midwicket for a single, Samuels throws needlessly at the non-striker's end and hits the stumps, they run an overthrow for the rebound
Pollard to Bailey, 1 run pulled towards deep square leg for a single
Samuels to Bailey, no run played towards Pollard at midwicket
Samuels to Bailey, 1 run full ball outside off, driven on the front foot towards long-on

Samuels to Hussey, 1 run Hussey's top edged a sweep but the ball falls safely at deep square leg, Hussey wanted a second run but Bailey did not. Hussey turned back after running a long way down but luckily for him the throw was to the keeper's end
Samuels to Bailey, 1 run played to deep square leg
Samuels to Hussey, no run cut hard off the back foot towards point
Samuels to Hussey, 1 run pushed into the gap at cover point for a quick single
Roach to Hussey, 1 run pitched up, driven to long-off
Roach to Bailey, 1 run full, on off but whipped through midwicket
Roach to Hussey, 1 leg bye outside leg, pushed through midwicket
Roach to Bailey, FOUR runs very full but straying on to leg stump and squeezed out sharply to the backward square boundary
Roach to Bailey, no run length, defended on the back foot into the on side
Narine to Hussey, 1 run tossed up, quick singled nudged out to point
Narine to Bailey, no run flatter, on the stumps, flipped towards square leg
Narine to Bailey, 1 wide pitched outside off but spun a long way down leg
Narine to Bailey, 3 runs give some air and played very late by Bailey, steering it past the keeper and down to third man, where the fielder gives chase
Narine to Hussey, no run tossed up, turning and beating the bat outside off
Narine to Hussey, 1 run on the stumps and driven to long-off
Narine to Bailey, 1 run flighted, swept over the infield, bouncing once before finding long leg
Roach to Bailey, no run full, driven back and fielded by the bowler
Roach to Bailey, 4 leg byes loses his line down the leg side, flicking the pad before skidding to the fine-leg boundary
Roach to Bailey, no run pitched up, punched to cover
Roach to Bailey, 1 run length, squirted through point on the walk
Roach to Hussey, 1 run Hussey also uses his feet, narrowing the gap between himself and the bowler and steering Roach through cover-point
Roach to Bailey, 1 run fulll delivery, driven to long-off
Samuels to Bailey, no run on the stumps, defended
Samuels to Bailey, 1 run drops short, swivels quickly into position and pulls to square leg
Samuels to Hussey, 1 run short, pushed off the back foot to point - there's a chance of a run out but the trhow's not good
Samuels to Bailey, no run dragged short, missed with an attempted guided outside off
Samuels to Bailey, no run flat, turned towards square leg
Samuels to Bailey, 1 run length, outside off, steered behind point
Bravo to Bailey, 1 run big lbw shout - it hit Bailey in line but was perhaps a shade too high. Bravo holds his head in his hands
Bravo to Hussey, no run beats the outside edge with one that skids across Hussey outside off
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run nudged away through cover - and that's Hussey's fifty. Mr Cricket is probably enjoying this
Bravo to Bailey, 1 run turned to leg off te stumps and that's a half-century to Bailey too - his first in international cricket
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run room outside off, deflected to short third man
Bravo to Bailey, 1 run pitched up, driven down the ground to long-on
Samuels to Bailey, 2 runs full, driven through extra-cover and the batsmen hustle back for a second run
Samuels to Bailey, no run full again, nurdled to midwicket
Samuels to Bailey, SIX runs steps out and carts a big six over long-on - that was an effortless slog from Bailey
Samuels to Bailey, no run flat, on the stumps, tries to turn to leg but the ball squirts back to Samuels

Samuels to Bailey, OUT swings hard on the pull - but he's sent it straight into the hands of square leg! It was a clean connection but unfortunately for Bailey he picked out Dwayne Bravo, who coolly pockets the ball
Samuels to Hussey, no run length, flicked to the man at short midwicket
Bravo to Hussey, no run tight line, on the stumps, worked into the on side
Bravo to Hussey, no run pitched up, driven to the fielder at cover
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run length ball, room outside off, steered to third man
Bravo to Hussey, FOUR runs straight long-hop and David Hussey seizes on it to whips a muscular hook shot out to the vacant deep midwicket boundary
Bravo to Hussey, no run length, nudged into the leg side
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run room outside off, the batsman leans into a drive past cover - they think about two but quickly reasses
Samuels to Hussey, no run flat, worked to midwicket
Samuels to Hussey, no run flighted a bit more, slight turn, inside-edged towards square leg
Samuels to Hussey, 1 run tossed up and swept hard to deep square leg
Samuels to Hussey, 1 run on the stumps, bit of bounce, worked square on the leg side
Samuels to Hussey, no run drops shorter, turned to midwicket
Samuels to Hussey, no run outside off, punched to the cover fielder
Russell to Hussey, 2 runs length, slanted across the lefty, driven on the up wide of mid-off
Russell to Hussey, FOUR runs rank ball, short and down the leg side, battered round the corner to long leg
Russell to Hussey, 1 run pitched up a bit more, on the legs, Michael Hussey skips out and punches through midwicket
Russell to Hussey, 1 run targeting the body, batsman gets on top of it and drops te ball to midwicket
Russell to Hussey, 1 run room outside off, driven to long-off
Russell to Hussey, 1 run length, guided down to third man
Samuels to Hussey, 1 run flighted, guided from outside off round the corner behind square
Samuels to Hussey, no run tossed up, Mike Hussey reverses his grip and shovels a sweep - but straight to third man
Samuels to Hussey, no run flatter, spinning across and Hussey misses with a swipe
Samuels to Hussey, 2 runs full, flicked off the pads for a hard-running couple to deep midwicket
Samuels to Hussey, 1 wide tossd up outside off, turning further - too far
Samuels to Hussey, 2 runs strays on to the pads and Hussey again finds the gap through midwicket
Samuels to Hussey, no run on the stumps, defended on the front foot into the off side
Roach to Hussey, 1 run full, David Hussey tries to glance but gets a leading edge over the head of point
Roach to Hussey, no run drops short as Hussey advances, missing with an attempted glide outside off
Roach to Hussey, no run pitched up, driven to midwicket who fields smartly and has a shy at the non-striker's end
Roach to Hussey, 1 run length, worked out to deep backward point
Roach to Hussey, no run length ball, outside off, the batsman plays and misses
Roach to Hussey, no run touch short, David Hussey tries to hook but can't get it off the square
Samuels to Hussey, 1 run drags it short, pulled through square leg for one
Samuels to Hussey, FOUR runs length ball, the batsman dances out and lofts the ball high over midwicket, coming to earth just in front of the rope before kicking on
Samuels to Hussey, 1 run flatter, nurdled into the leg side
Samuels to Hussey, OUT got him! Cannily done by Samuels, dragging his length down as Hussey advanced, getting a bit of bounce past the bat and leaving Hussey stranded. Baugh does the handiwork
Samuels to Christian, no run length, outside off, spinning in and Christian can't get anything on it
Samuels to Christian, no run on the stumps, turned to midwicket

Roach to Hussey, OUT Another one goes - a fabulous slower ball from Roach castles the younger Hussey! The batsman backed away, aiming for a swipe down the ground, but Roach rolled his fingers over it, the ball dying as it reached the crease before spinning into middle stump, half way up
Roach to Lee, 1 wide bouncer, way over Lee's head - welcome to the crease

Roach to Lee, OUT two in the over! Lee plays on! Roach sent down another slower ball, this not as well-directed, but the pace did for Lee who was through his windy drive too quickly, getting a thick bottom edge on to the timbers
Roach to McKay, 1 leg bye steered into the leg side
Roach to Christian, no run back of a length, prodded to point, well-fielded
Roach to Christian, no run Christian is beaten for pace outside off, his loose drive nowhere near connecting
Roach to Christian, 1 run full, worked off the pads into a gap at midwicket
Narine to Christian, 2 runs on off, flicked over his shoulder for a couple to fine leg
Narine to Christian, no run doesn't pick the wrong-un and Christian is hit on the arm trying to slog-sweep
Narine to Christian, 1 run another doosra, outside-edged to point

Narine to McKay, OUT McKay falls to the doosra! Australia are floundering like Andrew Flintoff in a pedalo! The batsman played back uncertainly and got a thin nick on one that went away from him. Looked like it might have clipped off, if he hadn't snicked it. That's four wickets for six runs in 13 balls
Narine to Doherty, no run tossed up, spinning hard and beating Doherty's prod outside off
Narine to Doherty, no run beaten outside off by another doosra

Roach to Christian, OUT Darren Bravo shows footballing skills Dwight Yorke would be proud of to run out Doherty! Christian dropped it short on the off side, Bravo hared in and side-footed the ball into the stumps from about six yards. GOOOOOAL!
Roach to Lyon, FOUR runs strays on to the legs and Lyon gets a sliver on it, the ball scooting fine to the rope
Roach to Lyon, no run full, poked into the off side
Roach to Lyon, no run length, outside off and pushed to cover
Roach to Lyon, no run back of a length, Lyon stays in the crease and is beaten as he dangles his bat out
Roach to Lyon, no run fuller, wide of off and the batsman steps out for an ostentatious leave
Narine to Christian, 2 runs full, chipped over the infield and Pollard kicks the ball in from the deep midwicket boundary
Narine to Christian, no run dragged down as Christian advances, drilled back to the bowler
Narine to Christian, SIX runs this time he connects! That's huge six - though he was nowhere near the pitch. He simply stood and smoked it over long-on
Narine to Christian, no run beaten trying to heave through the leg side by another wrong'un

Narine to Christian, OUT Christian is given out lbw - but he calls for the review. It hit the batsman full on the toe, in front of leg stump. Christian was hoping it was sliding down leg ... but it didn't have far to go and the replays suggest the ball would have thunked into the stump. He has to walk and West Indies have rounded up the last six

1.05pm: That's a quite remarkable comeback from West Indies, after toiling for so long in the heat of the Hussey-Bailey axis.They claimed the first three wickets for 58 and the last seven for 50 - but the filling in Australia's sandwich was pretty meaty. Have the hosts' bowlers done enough for the batsmen to win it? Find out with me and George in about
We're all set to begin. Johnson Charles and Kieran Powell to open for West Indies. Brett Lee with the new ball, from over the wicket.
West Indies will need to score the highest total of the series to win this game. Australia are playing the extra spinner today as well. It won't be easy for the hosts.
Lee to Powell, 3 runs nice flowing start, the batsman eases on to the front foot and drives a length ball from outside off through cover
Lee to Charles, no run length ball on middle and leg, Charles tries to glance behind square but misses and gets hit high on the pad
Lee to Charles, no run good length and straight, Charles defends from his crease to the bowler
Lee to Charles, no run full ball on middle and leg, Charles once again doesn't connect with the flick
Lee to Charles, 1 run played from the crease off the pads behind square
Lee to Powell, no run short of a length outside off at 132 kph, Powell stays in his crease and defends on the off side

McKay to Charles, no run he wasn't playing a shot there was he? McKay angled the ball down leg side and Charles tried to let it go, the ball hit his left thigh and raced towards fine leg, where the fielder dived to save the boundary. He needn't have bothered, the umpire called dead ball
McKay to Charles, no run once again he misses the leg glance and gets hit high on the pad
McKay to Charles, 1 run played towards midwicket for a quick single
McKay to Powell, no run short of a length on the pads, Powell plays from his crease towards square leg
McKay to Powell, no run McKay appeals for lbw but that pitched outside leg, Powell tried to flick but missed and was hit on the pad
McKay to Powell, no run Powell moves across his crease and defends a straight ball
Lee to Charles, FOUR runs that's not too short but Charles manages to play a controlled pull shot, swatting it from his crease to the backward square leg boundary, kept it along the ground
Lee to Charles, no run defended on the off side from the crease
Lee to Charles, no run played off the back foot towards point
Lee to Charles, no run Charles is through his pull far too early and gets hit on the shoulder, that was the slower short ball from Lee, rolled his fingers over it as he released it
Lee to Charles, no run a quicker ball outside off, Charles pushes forward and gets beaten
Lee to Charles, 1 run played in front of square leg for a single
McKay to Charles, no run good length around off stump, defended back towards the bowler
McKay to Charles, no run full and straight, Charles drives but the fielder at mid-on runs to his left to cut it off
McKay to Charles, no run the ball keeps low and nips in from a good length outside off, beating Charles between bat and body
McKay to Charles, no run that's a loose drive on the front foot at a good length delivery which holds its line after pitching outside off, he gets beaten
McKay to Charles, no run Charles has another swish at one outside off without moving his feet, makes no contact
McKay to Charles, no run this time he moves forward and towards the off to drive a length ball on the up towards point, doesn't beat the field though
Lee to Powell, no run Powell tries to drive straight but mis-times it on the off side
Lee to Powell, 1 run that's only slightly short and Powell leans towards the off and pulls between midwicket and square leg, he hit that against the angle across him from over the wicket

Lee to Charles, FOUR runs superb timing, Charles opened the face of the bat and used Lee's pace to steer the ball behind point, it raced to the boundary beating third man, who was running to his right
Lee to Charles, 1 run fuller and straighter, played with a close face towards midwicket
Lee to Powell, 2 runs driven on the front foot through cover
Lee to Powell, 1 wide that's a bit too wide outside off
Lee to Powell, no run
McKay to Charles, 1 run played off the pads behind square
McKay to Powell, no run Powell goes back and blocks
McKay to Powell, no run defended from the crease on the leg side
McKay to Powell, no run full delivery angling into the stumps, driven towards mid-on
McKay to Powell, no run steered off the back foot towards point
McKay to Powell, no run wicket to wicket line once again, the batsman defends
Doherty to Charles, no run slightly short in length outside off, cut off the back foot to point
Doherty to Charles, 1 run drifts into the right-hander, pitches on leg and middle, and begins to turn towards off, Charles moves forward and blocks
Doherty to Powell, no run Powell comes out of his crease and drives firmly to short midwicket
Doherty to Powell, no run Powell goes back to a fuller and straighter ball and is beaten outside off stump
Doherty to Powell, SIX runs shot! Powell goes down the pitch, didn't get to the pitch of the ball but still hoisted it off his pads over the midwicket boundary

Doherty to Powell, OUT he's been stumped now! He came down the track again, once again didn't get to the pitch of the ball, and was beaten by the straighter one. He pushed forward to try and defend but was beaten as the ball skidded past his outside edge. Wade whipped off the bails with the batsman well short
McKay to Charles, no run full and straight, Charles plays to midwicket
McKay to Charles, FOUR runs that's only a bit short and Charles slogs the ball from outside off to the deep midwicket boundary, he had to time it well to have beaten Michael Hussey
McKay to Charles, FOUR runs this time it's behind square on the off side. Charles playing the square drive, reaching away from his body to steer a length ball behind point, timing it beautifully
McKay to Charles, no run defended from the crease on the leg side
McKay to Charles, no run good length and straight, Charles defends from his crease
McKay to Charles, FOUR runs that's been blazed through point, too full from Lee and Charles played the square drive perfectly on the front foot, moving forward and swinging his bat hard
Doherty to Samuels, no run Samuels pushes from his crease and gets beaten by the ball as it rips across him, big turn

Doherty to Samuels, no run huge appeal for lbw, Kumar Dharmasena says not out and Australia want the decision reviewed. Doherty strikes Samuels full on the boot as he defends from the crease so the umpire has to assume the ball is going straight on, with the angle of the arm, it would have missed leg stump
Doherty to Samuels, no run left alone outside off stump
Doherty to Samuels, no run quicker ball fired into the pads, Samuels misses the glance
Doherty to Samuels, no run defended on the front foot towards point
Doherty to Samuels, no run strides forward once again to defend
Watson to Charles, no run the short of a length ball climbs on Charles, who drops his wrists and lets it go after having a little fend at it
Watson to Charles, no run good length and straight, Charles gets behind the line and defends

Watson to Charles, FOUR runs that's a loose shot, Charles simply swung at it without moving his feet, the fuller ball on a good length outside off took the inside edge and went past leg stump and the keeper
Watson to Charles, 1 run played off the back foot with an open face towards third man
Watson to Samuels, no run played towards point on the off side, Samuels pushed half forward and defended that
Watson to Samuels, 1 run steered from the crease towards third man
Lyon to Samuels, no run defended on the front foot
Lyon to Samuels, no run Samuels moves forward and outside the line of off stump to defend but gets hit on the pad by the offbreak that turns quite a lot
Lyon to Samuels, no run defended on the front foot and he makes contact this time
Lyon to Samuels, 1 run steps out of his crease and hits the ball hard through midwicket
Lyon to Charles, 1 run gets down on one knee and sweeps through square
Lyon to Samuels, no run defended on the front foot
Watson to Charles, no run good length and straight, Charles moves forward to defend and gets an inside edge on to the pad
Watson to Charles, no run good length on off stump once again, defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Watson to Charles, no run defended back towards Watson once again from the crease
Watson to Charles, no run Charles steps out of his crease and mis-times the pull to midwicket
Watson to Charles, no run defended off the back foot with an open face towards point
Watson to Charles, FOUR runs he does play this pull shot so well, Charles leans back and rolls his arms to keep the ball along the ground towards the deep backward square leg boundary
Lyon to Samuels, no run defended on the front foot, Samuels got a good stride in to smother the spin
Lyon to Samuels, no run this time he gets hit on the pad as he tries to defend but it was outside the line of off stump
Lyon to Samuels, no run defended on the front foot towards the leg side
Lyon to Samuels, no run Samuels moves forward and outside the line of off stump while defending
Lyon to Samuels, no run played off the front foot towards point
Lyon to Samuels, no run pitches outside off and spins into the right-hander, hitting the pad as Samuels pushes forward, Lyon appeals but lots of doubt about that one
Watson to Charles, 1 leg bye Charles stays back and plays the ball towards square leg

Watson to Samuels, OUT that looks plumb lbw and the umpire agrees. Samuels is on his way, he's decided not to review. Watson pitched full and straight, Samuels defended from his crease, as he usually does. He missed and was hit around the knee roll on the back pad. Absolutely plumb. That held its line instead of angling into the right-hander
Watson to Bravo, no run defended on the front foot towards the off side
Watson to Bravo, no run full and wide outside off, driven on the front foot towards point
Watson to Bravo, no run good length angling towards leg stump, played off the pads towards midwicket
Lyon to Charles, no run defended on the back foot on the off side, that spun a long way into the right-hander
Lyon to Charles, no run Charles gets down on one knee and tries to sweep, misses and is hit on the pad
Lyon to Charles, no run defended back to the bowler

Lyon to Charles, SIX runs that is a colossal hit into the stands beyond long-off, Charles came down the track, wasn't to the pitch of the ball, but still swung hard, freeing his arms. He made good contact and timed it beautifully
Lyon to Charles, 1 run swept behind square for a single
Lyon to Bravo, 2 runs played through point and there's a mix-up as they attempt the second, all's well in the end for West Indies
Watson to Charles, no run full ball angling into the right-hander, played towards midwicket
Watson to Charles, no run defended from the crease towards the off side
Watson to Charles, 1 run good length outside off, driven towards mid off for a single
Watson to Bravo, 1 run Watson induces an inside edge towards fine leg, Bravo wanted to flick that squarer
Watson to Charles, no run a full ball swings into the right-hander and hits the pad after Charles misses the flick, Watson begins to appeal but realises it was missing leg
Watson to Charles, no run played towards point where Michael Hussey is quick to prevent the single

Lyon to Bravo, SIX runs how has that carried for six? Bravo backed away to an offbreak that spun sharply into him from outside off stump and punched into the air over extra cover. It looked like he had hit it straight up but evidently he hadn't, it cleared the extra-cover boundary easily
Lyon to Bravo, 1 wide that's spun down leg side
Lyon to Bravo, 1 run played off the pads behind square
Lyon to Charles, no run defended on the front foot
Lyon to Charles, 1 run Charles tries to sweep but doesn't make proper contact
Lyon to Bravo, no run quicker and flatter ball, defended from the crease
Lyon to Bravo, no run strides forward to defend outside off stump
Watson to Charles, no run full, straight and Charles gets his feet out the way and drives down the ground to the bowler
Watson to Pollard, no run full, straight, defended back to the bowler
Watson to Pollard, no run pitched up, Pollard gropes outside off stump but is beaten
Watson to Pollard, no run tempting length, seaming a touch and Pollard props forward and misses outside off
Watson to Pollard, no run straighter line, Pollard gets behind this one and defends into the off side
Doherty to Bravo, no run spits one out of the rough! That turned a mile, from around off to well outside, almost beating Wade
Doherty to Bravo, 1 run flighted, tip and run to cover
Doherty to Pollard, no run tossed up, on leg stump and edged square ... and there's almost another mix up, Pollard sent back by Bravo after he had advanced half a dozen yards
Doherty to Pollard, no run full length, pushed towards cover
Doherty to Pollard, no run full, on the stumps, Pollard leans around his pads and defends
Doherty to Pollard, no run tossed up on leg and chipped to mid-on - Bravo is sent back this time, in a muddle of arms and legs as the throw comes in
Watson to Bravo, 1 run full, driven to mid-off
Watson to Pollard, no run length, room outside off and driven square, fielded at backward point
Watson to Pollard, 2 runs pitched up and timed sweetly off his pads through midwicket
Watson to Pollard, no run defended into the off side on the front foot
Watson to Pollard, no run keeper up the stumps ... defended on off, pushing forward
Watson to Pollard, no run length, Pollard gets solidly behind it and pushes into the covers
Doherty to Bravo, no run tossed up on off, spinning sharply away from the batsman, who plays no stroke
Doherty to Bravo, 1 run pushed into the covers for a scrambled single
Doherty to Pollard, no run flighted, on off and defended on the front foot
Doherty to Pollard, 1 run flighted, on leg stump and tickled into the leg side
Doherty to Bravo, no run tossed up and defended on the stumps
Lee to Pollard, 2 runs full, worked off his pads for a quick couple
Lee to Pollard, 1 run full, driven away square on the off side
Lee to Baugh, no run back of a length, cut hard but fielded by backward point
Lee to Baugh, 1 run length delivery, steered behind point
Lee to Pollard, 2 runs full, straight and clipped to deep backward square again
Lee to Pollard, no run bouncer, which Pollard concertinas his considerable height under
Doherty to Baugh, no run tossed up by Doherty and he gets big turned outside off, Baugh planting his foot but keeping his bat out of the way
Doherty to Baugh, no run lured forward on off stump and Baugh is beaten past his outside edge
Doherty to Baugh, no run flighted, on the stumps and Baugh gets his bat behind this one on the front foot
Doherty to Baugh, no run pitching on off and turning, hits Baugh on the pads - but the appeal is turned down
Doherty to Baugh, no run tossed across towards leg, straightening and again striking the pad
Doherty to Baugh, no run full, Baugh gets forward and squirts the ball out to point - that's a maiden for XD
Lee to Pollard, no run full and quick from Lee, the batsman gets behind it
Lee to Pollard, no run pitched up on the stumps and worked towards midwicket, cut off by the fielder
Lee to Pollard, FOUR runs length ball outside off and Pollard steps out, swings hard through midwicket - it wasn't the cleanest connection but there was still enough power to get it to the rope
Lee to Pollard, no run yorker length but Pollard gets his bat down on it in time

Lee to Pollard, SIX runs full toss and BOOMED out of the ground! Pollard set his shoulders and swung straight through the line, sending the ball whistling back over Lee's head - and over the roof of the stand at long-on
Lee to Pollard, 1 run touch shorter, on the stumps and worked square off the legs
Doherty to Pollard, no run flighted, outside off and dabbed to short third man
Doherty to Pollard, no run shorter, flatter, Pollard tries to hack through the off side and inside-edges past his stumps
Doherty to Pollard, no run beaten by one that turns past the outside edge and there's an appeal for a stumping - but Pollard had got his foot back
Doherty to Pollard, 1 run floated up outside off and Pollard guides it past the fielder inside the circle
Doherty to Baugh, 1 leg bye on the stumps, drifting down leg and deflected via Baugh's pad, though it struck him outside the line
Doherty to Pollard, 2 runs on the legs and Pollard flicks it round the corner for two
McKay to Baugh, 1 run length, outside off and dabbed down to third man
McKay to Pollard, 1 run not enough pace to trouble Pollard, who pushes to cover
McKay to Baugh, 1 run decent length, room outside off for Baugh to punch square again
McKay to Pollard, no run on the stumps and worked into the on side
McKay to Pollard, no run keeps up that nagging line, propped square but too close to the fielder
McKay to Pollard, 1 run dropped short on the off side and they snatch a single - though a direct hit would have run Pollard out
Doherty to Pollard, FOUR runs drops short and Pollard steps back, loosens his arms and swings like a lumberjack, the ball rollicking away to the cover boundary
Doherty to Pollard, 1 run goes back and plays a more delicate stroke to third man
Doherty to Baugh, no run big appeal again from Doherty, the ball thunking into the pad as Baugh pushed forward - again there was a question about the line of off stump
Doherty to Baugh, 1 run swung hard from outside off to deep square leg on the sweep
Doherty to Pollard, no run tossed up and played back to the bowler
Doherty to Pollard, no run outside off and clipped to point
McKay to Baugh, no run off-stump line, knocked into the covers
McKay to Baugh, no run drops slightly short, Baugh tries to hook but the bounce deceives him and he wears the ball on his body
McKay to Baugh, no run back ot a length again, plopped out to cover
McKay to Baugh, 1 run pitched up and driven square, slight misfield at point
McKay to Pollard, 1 run straighter, on the stumps and flicked off the hips in front of long leg
McKay to Baugh, no run slower ball from McKay, pitched up outside off and Baugh jams his bat on it
Lyon to Pollard, no run flat delivery, quickish, prodded into the off side by the big man
Lyon to Pollard, SIX runs pitched up and Pollard steams another big six down the ground, swinging his arms gaily
Lyon to Pollard, no run room outside off to cut but Pollard can't beat the man at point
Lyon to Russell, 1 leg bye straighter line, pops up off the pitch and loops past short leg off a pad
Lyon to Baugh, no run floated up outside off and scuffed to a fielder on the drive
McKay to Russell, no run pitched up outside off and left by the batsman
McKay to Russell, FOUR runs full, outside off and Russell clears his front foot to swing a clean, forceful drive over mid-off and away to the fence
McKay to Russell, no run straighter, dropped into the off side

McKay to Russell, SIX runs hello, goodbye! Russell picks up McKay's slower ball and deposits it on to the roof of the stand. Not sure it went quite as far as Pollard's but it was still an almighty heave. Looks like they'll need a replacement ball, too ...
McKay to Russell, no run angled into the body and dabbed towards short midwicket
McKay to Russell, no run length and beats the stroke, swinging down the leg side
Lyon to Baugh, no run tossed up and dribbled into the leg side
Lyon to Baugh, no run length, spins back, chopped to point
Lyon to Baugh, no run tossed up, outside off, spinning into the pad
Lyon to Baugh, no run dragged wider and Baugh misses with a lusty drive
Lyon to Baugh, no run played out to point, against the spin
Lyon to Baugh, no run flatter, outside off and spinning back - again hit on the pad but the appeal is half-hearted. Maiden from Lyon
Christian to Russell, 2 runs short, whipped away to backward square leg
Christian to Russell, 2 runs back of a length again and Russell hammers it over cover, the fielder getting a finger tip to it but only serving to take the pace off
Christian to Russell, 1 run length, flicked through cover as the batsman comes forward
Christian to Baugh, 1 run flicked off the pads through square leg
Christian to Russell, 1 run short, angling in and thrashed baseball-style down the ground to long-on
Christian to Baugh, no run length ball, played into the off side
Lyon to Russell, no run tossed up, beating Russell's inside edge to hit the pad - umpire shakes his head
Lyon to Russell, no run flighted in, striking the pads again but well outside off
Lyon to Russell, FOUR runs tossed up and driven hard through cover to the rope
Lyon to Russell, 2 runs drags his line across and paddled around the corner this time
Lyon to Russell, no run turned off the legs into the on side
Lyon to Russell, no run shorter, outside off and spinning back, hitting the batsman on the body
Christian to Baugh, no run short of a length around off stump, Baugh defends from his crease
Christian to Baugh, 1 wide fuller length but the line is down leg side
Christian to Baugh, 1 run Baugh gets down on one knee and swings a length ball towards fine leg
Christian to Russell, no run Russel begins to make room by moving towards leg but then defends to the bowler
Christian to Russell, 1 run pushed off the back foot towards midwicket and they run a single before the fielder on the edge of the circle can come running in
Christian to Baugh, no run played off the front foot to cover
Christian to Baugh, 1 run good length and straight, Baugh stays back and dabs towards point and a sharp single
Lyon to Baugh, 1 run big turn into the right-hander, he's moved towards leg and dabbed that from outside leg stump towards short third man, that bounced high as well
Lyon to Russell, no run Russell attempts a slog sweep but gets an inside edge on to the pad
Lyon to Russell, 2 runs he's pulled that flat and hard towards deep midwicket where Lee sprints to his right and taps the ball back into play in the nick of time
Lyon to Russell, 2 runs pushes forward to defend but gets an outside edge past the keeper for runs
Lyon to Russell, no run defended on the back foot towards the off side

Lyon to Russell, FOUR runs Russell strides forward and plays the cover drive with immense power into the gap on the boundary, he hit it all along the ground too. Lyon had flighted that ball outside off stump, but Russell hit it against the turn.
Watson to Baugh, no run good length and straight, Baugh stays in his crease, gets behind the line, and defends tentatively ...
Watson to Baugh, 1 leg bye shorter length angling into the body, Baugh fends towards square
Watson to Russell, no run length ball wide outside off stump, Russell reaches for it and throws his bat at the ball but can't make contact
Watson to Russell, no run steered from the crease towards point where the fielder runs and dives to his right to save runs
Watson to Russell, no run defended back to the bowler
Watson to Russell, no run driven off the front foot towards cover, Watson bowls a maiden with the field in the circle
Doherty to Baugh, no run Baugh strides forward and outside the line of off stump to defend but gets hit on the pad

Doherty to Baugh, no run what's he trying there? Baugh backs away, exposing all three stumps, and tries to slog inside out over the off side as the ball turns away from him. He gets beaten and would have been bowled had the ball not turned so much past off stump
Doherty to Baugh, no run Baugh gets hit on the pad and the ball lobs to slip, there's an appeal for a catch
Doherty to Baugh, no run defended on the front foot to the bowler
Doherty to Baugh, no run played off the back foot towards point with an open face
Doherty to Baugh, 1 wide he's fired that down leg side and Wade yelps in pain because that ball's smacked him on the knee cap
Doherty to Baugh, no run defended on the leg side, no runs off the bat in the first two batting Powerplay overs
Watson to Russell, no run pushed off the front foot towards the bowler
Watson to Russell, no run good length and straight, defended from the crease to cover
Watson to Russell, no run good length on middle, that ball straightened off the pitch and Russell defended it from his crease
Watson to Russell, no run defended towards midwicket once again, no width at all from Watson, wicket to wicket on a good length
Watson to Russell, no run relentless line and length, Russell tries to work towards square but gets a leading edge towards the bowler
Watson to Russell, no run Russell tries to drive but gets an inside edge on to his shoe and towards the off side, Watson fields
Doherty to Baugh, no run defended on the front foot on the off side
Doherty to Baugh, 2 runs finally, Baugh goes back and cuts the ball as it spins away from the right-hander, the ball is pulled in close to the third man boundary, Warner was chasing it
Doherty to Baugh, no run beaten outside the off stump
Doherty to Baugh, no run defended towards cover
Doherty to Baugh, 2 runs Baugh slog sweeps, and gets a top edge over the keeper's head
Doherty to Baugh, no run Baugh tries to slog, his front leg planted outside leg stump and his bat flailing wildly in the air, he gets beaten by the turn away from him

Watson to Russell, (no ball) Watson's 150th wicket is likely to be a game-breaking one. The pressure tells on Russell, he backs away and slogs at a good length and straight ball. He misses and Watson hits the stumps. Russell begins to walk off but then waits, the umpire wants to check if Watson has over stepped. He has! Huge break for West Ind

Watson to Russell, 1 run he's bowled him again! But Russell can't be out because it's a free-hit. Russell tried to pull a good length ball and missed once again. I haven't seen that happen. Bowled twice in a row but not out both times
Watson to Baugh, no run Baugh tries to play the big drive but gets an inside edge on to the pad
Watson to Baugh, no run defended on the off side
Watson to Baugh, no run Watson pitches full outside off and nips the ball in, Baugh stays in his crease and tries to cut, he gets beaten
Watson to Baugh, 1 run short of a length and straight, played towards square
Watson to Russell, 1 run good length and straight, pushed towards long-on for a single
McKay to Russell, 1 run the ball rises on Russell from short of a length and he tries to pull off the front foot, the top edge lobs safely towards midwicket
McKay to Baugh, FOUR runs Baugh's found the boundary! He had width to cut and he made good contact and placed it into the gap on the third man boundary
McKay to Baugh, no run Baugh drives loosely away from his body and is beaten by the slower ball

McKay to Baugh, FOUR runs he's found the boundary again! This time off the outside edge. Baugh swung hard at a length ball outside off, he was aiming for long-off, he found the third-man boundary instead
McKay to Baugh, 1 wide the very slow ball outside off stump but the line is too wide
McKay to Baugh, no run defended on the back foot, the line was wicket to wicket from McKay
McKay to Baugh, 1 run a slow full ball, it looped towards the blockhole and Baugh drove trough cover
Lee to Baugh, no run played from the crease towards point

Lee to Baugh, no run Lee appeals for lbw because the short of a length ball doesn't rise that much and hits Baugh on the thigh after he misses the pull, that looked high though, replays indicate it might have clipped the bails
Lee to Baugh, 1 run flicked off the pads towards midwicket
Lee to Russell, 1 run good length on off, Russell pushes at it from his crease and gets an outside edge towards third man
Lee to Baugh, 1 bye a full ball wide outside off, Baugh is beaten but Wade fumbles, allowing the bye
Lee to Russell, 1 run good length outside off, Russell taps in front of point and sprints to retain strike
McKay to Russell, 1 run Russell wanted to send that to the midwicket boundary but toe ended the ball past the diving Wade towards third man, he was too early on the pull
McKay to Baugh, 1 run Baugh moves across and turns the ball to short fine leg, Russell steams through for the single. Things are beginning to happen ...
McKay to Sammy, 1 run wide outside off stump, cut towards third man
McKay to Baugh, 1 run on the pads, clipped to short fine for single
McKay to Sammy, no run good length and straight, defended on the front foot

Lee to Baugh, 2 runs Baugh moves towards the off and hooks a short of a length ball awkwardly towards fine leg, Doherty sprints after it from short fine leg and slides in the nick of time to save four, Wade had also run after it and he fired the throw in
Lee to Baugh, no run beaten outside off stump
Lee to Baugh, 1 run pushed towards point for a single
Lee to Sammy, no run good length and straight, defended to the bowler
Lee to Sammy, no run good length outside off stump, defended towards the bowler again
Lee to Sammy, no run Sammy gets squared up in his crease as he defends a good length ball towards the off side
McKay to Baugh, no run played from the crease towards cover
McKay to Baugh, no run driven from the crease towards backward point
McKay to Baugh, no run Baugh wafts outside off and gets beaten
McKay to Baugh, FOUR runs shot! Baugh moves towards the off and swings a length ball from middle and leg to the deep backward square leg boundary, fine leg was in the circle. Top shot
McKay to Sammy, 1 run Sammy moves forward and drives to cover for a single, keeping the new batsman Narine off strike
Lee to Sammy, 1 leg bye Lee roars an appeal for lbw after he hits Sammy just above the pad, looked a little high, Wade runs to his right to limit the leg byes
Lee to Narine, no run played off the back foot on the off side
Lee to Narine, no run defended from the crease towards cover
Lee to Narine, no run the short of a length delivery climbs on and angles into Narine from round the wicket, Narine does well to let it go
Lee to Narine, no run Narine tries to drive the fuller ball through cover but mis-times it towards the bowler
Lee to Narine, no run played from the crease towards point
Watson to Sammy, no run good length and very straight, Sammy gets behind the line and defends to the bowler
Watson to Sammy, 1 run the line is a bit straighter, Sammy chips the flick flat over the infield at midwicket
Watson to Narine, no run Watson goes round the wicket to Narine and beats him outside off stump
Watson to Narine, 2 runs too full on the pads, clipped through midwicket and even the fleet-footed Michael Hussey on the midwicket boundary can't prevent the second
Watson to Narine, FOUR runs Watson's line is poor again, on the pads, Narine stays balanced and closes his face to turn the ball behind square and into the gap on the boundary
Watson to Narine, FOUR runs Narine's playing a gem for West Indies. He stays extremely balanced on the front foot and launchs a length ball from outside off to the wide long-off boundary
Lee to Sammy, 1 run short of a length outside off, Sammy pushes to point for a single and the crowd is cheering everything now

Lee to Narine, OUT splendid catch at short cover! David Hussey throws the ball in the air in celebration. Length delivery angling into the right-hander from round the wicket, Narine drove at it and hit the ball on the up, he middled it but the ball went straight to Hussey who took a low catch
Lee to Roach, no run full ball outside off, driven to cover
Lee to Roach, no run short ball outside off stump, Roach lets it go
Lee to Roach, 1 wide Lee's bowled the full ball wide down leg side, Wade collects
Lee to Roach, 2 runs Roach takes on McKay's arm from third man and beats the throw comfortably, he had steered it with an open face
Lee to Roach, 1 run a full ball outside off, Roach plays the square drive to deep point and runs the single, so Sammy will not have the strike

Doherty to Roach, FOUR runs that's fired down leg side and Roach sweeps, I think he got some bat on that and the ball races towards fine leg. The fielder slides to prevent the ball from hitting the rope but his foot was touching the rope, that's a boundary. West Indies need 9 off 11 balls. Australia need one wicket
Doherty to Roach, no run Roach chases a wide ball outside off and gets beaten
Doherty to Roach, 1 run swept toward fine leg for one more, there's tremendous noise at Arnos Vale at the moment
Doherty to Sammy, 1 run Sammy pushes the ball to cover and sprints, there's a direct hit but Roach is safe at the striker's end, the umpire asks for replays to be doubly sure
Doherty to Roach, no run defended back to the bowler
Doherty to Roach, no run played with an open face behind point
Lee to Sammy, 1 run Sammy slogs at a full ball around off and forces it towards midwicket, Watson dives at extra cover to prevent the overthrow
Lee to Roach, 1 run Roach jumps back and opens the face to steer a short of a length ball towards third man, sensible batting from the No. 11

Lee to Sammy, FOUR runs Sammy's tied the scores with a fearsome hit, thrashing the ball flat towards the wide long-on boundary. The fielder at long-on ran to his right and dived desperately, he couldn't stop it

Lee to Sammy, OUT Oh Roach, what have you done? After batting with such composure, with West Indies on the verge of victory, Roach sets off for a non-existent single after Sammy had played the ball towards point. Actually Sammy had begun to run as well and then stopped, looking in desperation as Roach continued towards and past him. Sammy was st
That's all we have for you today. The fourth game is on Friday in St Lucia, let's hope it's just as good. Thank you for all your emails. Cheers.

Michael Hussey is the Man of the Match for his innings of 67. This pitch was not easy to bat on, big turn and bounce for the spinners, so they were tough runs. Hussey says he feels as though Australia should have won but is relieved to have held on for the tie.

5.30 pm West Indies were out of this contest having lost five wickets for very little but they've fought back admirably. They couldn't quite get over the line though, so the series remains 1-1 with two to play.
Match tied
Player of the match is Michael Hussey, AUS
